mapper.sql: select HOUSE_RANGE houseRange , HOUSE_GUEST houseGuest, HOUSE_TYPE houseType, HOUSE_ROOM_NUMBER houseRoomNumber, HOUSE_LOCATION houseLocation from HOUSEFILTER
mapper.update: update HOUSEFILTER set HOUSE_RANGE=${houseRange}, HOUSE_GUEST_NUMBER=${houseGuestNumber}, HOUSE_TYPE=${houseType}, HOUSE_ROOM_NUMBER=${houseRoomNumber}, HOUSE_LOCATION=${houseLocation} where HOUSE_SERIAL=${houseSerial}
